name: Devil's Dice (Creative Canvas)
description:
Devil's Dice is a Platformer Puzzle game where the player is a Lost soul trapped in the gasp of the Hell Master, Mr. Devil.

The player has to complete his endless Trails to prove him his victory and claim the player's soul.

Every Level has a Devil's Dice. Jumping on the Dice will give the player an equivalent amount of health, less the number less the health. The dice will also redirect to the endless terrains.

Controls : Tap on the screen / SPACEBAR to start moving

Tap / SACEBAR to Jump

Jump on a wall and then Jump again to change directions

All the Best !
